16549.「あっ <pc>も パラディンの必殺技を\n 覚えるための修行を してきたところ:
Oh, <pc> has just trained to learn
the special moves of a paladin? I just did
that too!

16550.「きっと 次は パラディンガードで\n ジェニャを 守る任務なのだ！\n オイラ:
Surely, my next assignment will be to protect
Jenya with the Knight Watch! I trained hard to
become a Paladin Guard.

16551.「さあ ストロング団長に報告して\n 必殺技を 伝授してもらうのだ！:
Now, report to Commander Strong and ask him to
teach you his special move!

16552.「緊急召集で 発表された話……\n 真実なんですよね？\n ジェニャに そんな役:
The story that was announced at the emergency
call... it's true, isn't it? I didn't know
Jenya had that kind of role.

16554.「ならわしのことは 知っていたが\n まさか今年が その年だったとはな……。:
I knew of the "Narimasu", but I had no idea
that this was the year...

16555.「１００年に一度 大地の竜に いけにえを\n 捧げる年……。しかも あのジェニャ:
Once every 100 years, a sacrifice is made to
the dragon of the earth... and Jenya is the
sacrificial victim. ...

16557.「どういうことなのだ！？\n オイラたちは ジェニャを守るために\n 必殺技の修:
What's going on? I went there to train to kill
to protect Jenya!

16558.「なのに どうして\n ジェニャが いけにえなのだ！？: So why is Jenya a sacrifice?

16559.「………必殺技は ジェニャどのを\n 無事に 大地の竜バウギアのもとへ\n 送り:
...the special move was necessary to get Jenya
safely back to Earthwyrm.

16562.「殺すために 守らせるって なんなのだ！！:
What good is protecting someone if they're
going to kill them!!

16563.「…………オレたちだって\n 守るために 命をかける 王宮パラディンだ。\n そ:
We're palace paladins who die to protect and
serve. That's not what I want to do.

16564.「だが…… 大地の竜が目覚めれば 大規模な\n 地震が起き この大陸は 壊滅の危:
But... if the dragon of the earth awakens, it will cause a massive earthquake that will threaten to destroy this continent. There is
no other way to put the dragon to sleep again...

16565.「たくさんの人を救うためだから\n ジェニャを 犠牲にしていいって言うのだ！？\:
You are willing to sacrifice Jenya to save so
many people! I will not allow such a thing!

16568.「あたしが生まれたんは 山奥の 貧しい集落で\n 小さい子たちが 食べるものがな:
I was born in a poor village deep in the
mountains where small children were dying
every day for lack of food.

16569.「みんなの生活費を かせぐために\n がんばってたんやけど それじゃあ 全然\n:
We were working hard to make ends meet for
everyone, but the village was so poor that
that was not enough at all.

16570.「そんな集落が なくならへんのは はるか昔\n 大地の竜と交わした 約束があるか:
The reason such settlements have not disappeared is because of a promise made long ago with the dragon of the earth. To dedicate
every girl born in the tribe...

16571.「だから グロスナー王に お願いしてん。\n あたしが いけにえになるから お金:
So I asked King Grossner for a favor. I'm going to become a sacrifice, so please give me some money. Please give food to everyone in
the village.

16572.「グロスナー王は めっちゃ いい人でな。\n たくさん お金くれたんよ！\n だ:
King Grossner was a very nice man. He gave me
lots of money! So I have nothing to worry
about anymore.

16573.「あの時の…… お金が そうだったのだ？\n ジェニャを迎えにいったとき\n お:
That... that was the money, wasn't it? That
box of money you gave the old lady when you
went to pick up Jenya.

16574.「そうや！ グロスナー王もな ほんまは\n 誰かを犠牲にするなんて イヤやねんて:
That's right! King Grossner really doesn't
like the idea of sacrificing anyone. But...
this can't be helped.

16575.「せやからな…… わかってや ズーボーはん。\n あたしは これで満足やねん。時:
So... you have to understand, Mr. Zubo. I'm
happy now. When the time comes, I want you to
take me to the dragon of the earth.

16577.「大地の竜バウギアとは オーグリード大陸の\n 地底深くに眠る 天災級の破壊力を:
Earthwyrm is an evil dragon with the
destructive power of a natural disaster that
lies deep underground in the Ogreed continent.

16578.「ひとたび目覚めれば 大規模な地震を起こし\n この大陸を たやすく 海に沈めて:
Once awakened, it will cause massive earthquakes and easily submerge this continent into the sea. There is no way to resist the
dragon of the earth...

16579.「あきらめろ ズーボー。\n これは グロスナー王の決断であり 命令だ！:
Give it up, Zubo. This is King Grossner's
decision and order!

16580.「……お前たちには パラディンとして\n これからも 成長してくれることを期待し:
...I hope you will continue to grow as
paladins, and I will teach you the special
technique Knight Watch!

16581.「……お前たちには パラディンとして\n これからも 成長してくれることを期待し:
...I present to you the rewards of your
training in the hope that you will continue to
grow as paladins!

16582.「オレたちは 王宮パラディンとして\n グロスナー王の命令を 果たす！\n 賛同:
We, the paladins of the royal court, will fulfill King Grossner's command! Those of you who do not agree, do not accept the next
assignment! That is all!

16585.「大丈夫です ジェニャさま。\n しばらくアタマを冷やせば\n ズーボーさんも:
It's all right, Jenya. I'm sure Mr. Zubo will
understand if you let your head cool down for
a while.

16586.「さあ…… お部屋に戻りましょう。: Now... let's go back to your room.
